targets.rawSql: SELECT MIN(scan_date), scan_batch_id, SUM(low_count) as lows, SUM(medium_count) as mediums, SUM(high_count) as highs, SUM(critical_count) as criticals FROM scans WHERE image_variant = 'baseline' GROUP BY scan_batch_id LIMIT 50

WITH baseline_total AS (
  SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity IN ('CRITICAL', 'HIGH') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as total
  FROM vulnerabilities v
  JOIN scans s ON v.scan_id = s.id
  JOIN images i ON v.image_id = i.id
  WHERE s.id IN (
    SELECT MAX(id) FROM scans WHERE scan_status = 'completed' AND image_variant = 'baseline' GROUP BY image_id
  ) AND i.image_variant = 'baseline'
  AND (NULLIF('${package_category:raw}', 'All') IS NULL OR v.package_category = '${package_category}')
),
chainguard_total AS (
  SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity IN ('CRITICAL', 'HIGH') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as total
  FROM vulnerabilities v
  JOIN scans s ON v.scan_id = s.id
  JOIN images i ON v.image_id = i.id
  WHERE s.id IN (
    SELECT MAX(id) FROM scans WHERE scan_status = 'completed' AND image_variant = 'chainguard' GROUP BY image_id
  ) AND i.image_variant = 'chainguard'
  AND (NULLIF('${package_category:raw}', 'All') IS NULL OR v.package_category = '${package_category}')
)
SELECT 
  ROUND((((b.total - c.total)::numeric / NULLIF(b.total, 0)) * 100)::numeric, 1) as "Critical & High Reduction"
FROM baseline_total b, chainguard_total c;

WITH baseline_total AS (
  SELECT COUNT(*) as total
  FROM vulnerabilities v
  JOIN scans s ON v.scan_id = s.id
  JOIN images i ON v.image_id = i.id
  WHERE s.id IN (
    SELECT MAX(id) FROM scans WHERE scan_status = 'completed' AND image_variant = 'baseline' GROUP BY image_id
  ) AND i.image_variant = 'baseline'
  AND (NULLIF('${package_category:raw}', 'All') IS NULL OR v.package_category = '${package_category}')
),
chainguard_total AS (
  SELECT COUNT(*) as total
  FROM vulnerabilities v
  JOIN scans s ON v.scan_id = s.id
  JOIN images i ON v.image_id = i.id
  WHERE s.id IN (
    SELECT MAX(id) FROM scans WHERE scan_status = 'completed' AND image_variant = 'chainguard' GROUP BY image_id
  ) AND i.image_variant = 'chainguard'
  AND (NULLIF('${package_category:raw}', 'All') IS NULL OR v.package_category = '${package_category}')
)
SELECT 
  ROUND((((b.total - c.total)::numeric / NULLIF(b.total, 0)) * 100)::numeric, 1) as "Vulnerability Reduction"
FROM baseline_total b, chainguard_total c;

SELECT 
  SUM(i.size_bytes) / 1024.0 / 1024.0 as "Total Size"
FROM images i
WHERE i.image_variant = 'baseline'
AND i.id IN (
  SELECT DISTINCT image_id FROM scans WHERE scan_status = 'completed' AND image_variant = 'baseline'
);

SELECT 
  SUM(i.size_bytes) / 1024.0 / 1024.0 as "Total Size"
FROM images i
WHERE i.image_variant = 'chainguard'
AND i.id IN (
  SELECT DISTINCT image_id FROM scans WHERE scan_status = 'completed' AND image_variant = 'chainguard'
);

WITH baseline_batches AS (
  SELECT
    TO_CHAR(MIN(s.scan_date), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as metric,
    MIN(s.scan_date) as sort_date,
    SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'CRITICAL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Critical",
    SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'HIGH' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "High",
    SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'MEDIUM' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Medium",
    SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'LOW' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Low",
    s.scan_batch_id,
    1 as sort_order
  FROM scans s
  JOIN images i ON s.image_id = i.id
  LEFT JOIN vulnerabilities v ON v.scan_id = s.id
    AND (NULLIF('${package_category:raw}', 'All') IS NULL OR v.package_category = '${package_category}')
  WHERE s.scan_status = 'completed'
    AND s.scan_batch_id IS NOT NULL
    AND s.image_variant = 'baseline'
    AND (NULLIF('$image_filter', 'All') IS NULL OR
         CASE
           WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'vuln-demo/%' THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(i.image_name, '^vuln-demo/', '')
           WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'grafana/%' THEN 'grafana'
           WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'postgres/%' THEN 'postgres'
           WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'prom/%' THEN 'prometheus'
           WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'python/%' THEN 'python'
           ELSE REGEXP_REPLACE(i.image_name, '^.+/', '')
         END = '$image_filter')
  GROUP BY s.scan_batch_id
),
numbered_baseline AS (
  SELECT
    *,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY sort_date) as batch_num,
    COUNT(*) OVER () as total_batches
  FROM baseline_batches
),
labeled_baseline AS (
  SELECT
    metric,
    sort_date,
    CASE
      WHEN batch_num = total_batches THEN 'Baseline'
      ELSE 'Batch #' || batch_num
    END as label,
    "Critical",
    "High",
    "Medium",
    "Low",
    sort_order
  FROM numbered_baseline
),
latest_chainguard AS (
  SELECT
    TO_CHAR(MIN(s.scan_date) + INTERVAL '1 second', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as metric,
    MIN(s.scan_date) + INTERVAL '1 second' as sort_date,
    'Chainguard' as label,
    SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'CRITICAL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Critical",
    SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'HIGH' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "High",
    SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'MEDIUM' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Medium",
    SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'LOW' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Low",
    2 as sort_order
  FROM scans s
  JOIN images i ON s.image_id = i.id
  LEFT JOIN vulnerabilities v ON v.scan_id = s.id
    AND (NULLIF('${package_category:raw}', 'All') IS NULL OR v.package_category = '${package_category}')
  WHERE s.scan_status = 'completed'
    AND s.scan_batch_id IS NOT NULL
    AND s.image_variant = 'chainguard'
    AND (NULLIF('$image_filter', 'All') IS NULL OR
         CASE
           WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'vuln-demo/%' THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(i.image_name, '^vuln-demo/', '')
           WHEN i.image_name LIKE '%/grafana' THEN 'grafana'
           WHEN i.image_name LIKE '%/postgres' THEN 'postgres'
           WHEN i.image_name LIKE '%/prometheus' THEN 'prometheus'
           WHEN i.image_name LIKE '%/python-demo-custom' THEN 'python'
           ELSE REGEXP_REPLACE(i.image_name, '^.+/', '')
         END = '$image_filter')
  GROUP BY s.scan_batch_id
  ORDER BY MIN(s.scan_date) DESC
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT label as metric, "Critical", "High", "Medium", "Low"
FROM (
  SELECT metric, sort_date, label, "Critical", "High", "Medium", "Low", sort_order FROM labeled_baseline
  UNION ALL
  SELECT metric, sort_date, label, "Critical", "High", "Medium", "Low", sort_order FROM latest_chainguard
) combined
ORDER BY sort_order, sort_date;

SELECT
  TO_CHAR(MIN(s.scan_date), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as metric,
  SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'CRITICAL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Critical",
  SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'HIGH' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "High",
  SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'MEDIUM' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Medium",
  SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'LOW' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Low"
FROM scans s
JOIN images i ON s.image_id = i.id
LEFT JOIN vulnerabilities v ON v.scan_id = s.id
  AND (NULLIF('${package_category:raw}', 'All') IS NULL OR v.package_category = '${package_category}')
WHERE s.scan_status = 'completed'
  AND s.scan_batch_id IS NOT NULL
  AND s.image_variant = 'chainguard'
  AND (NULLIF('$image_filter', 'All') IS NULL OR
       CASE
         WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'vuln-demo/%' THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(i.image_name, '^vuln-demo/', '')
         WHEN i.image_name LIKE '%/grafana' THEN 'grafana'
         WHEN i.image_name LIKE '%/postgres' THEN 'postgres'
         WHEN i.image_name LIKE '%/prometheus' THEN 'prometheus'
         WHEN i.image_name LIKE '%/python-demo-custom' THEN 'python'
         ELSE REGEXP_REPLACE(i.image_name, '^.+/', '')
       END = '$image_filter')
GROUP BY s.scan_batch_id
ORDER BY MIN(s.scan_date);

SELECT
  TO_CHAR(MIN(s.scan_date), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as metric,
  SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'CRITICAL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Critical",
  SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'HIGH' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "High",
  SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'MEDIUM' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Medium",
  SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'LOW' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Low"
FROM scans s
JOIN images i ON s.image_id = i.id
LEFT JOIN vulnerabilities v ON v.scan_id = s.id
  AND (NULLIF('${package_category:raw}', 'All') IS NULL OR v.package_category = '${package_category}')
WHERE s.scan_status = 'completed'
  AND s.scan_batch_id IS NOT NULL
  AND s.image_variant = 'baseline'
  AND (NULLIF('$image_filter', 'All') IS NULL OR
       CASE
         WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'vuln-demo/%' THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(i.image_name, '^vuln-demo/', '')
         WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'grafana/%' THEN 'grafana'
         WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'postgres/%' THEN 'postgres'
         WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'prom/%' THEN 'prometheus'
         WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'python/%' THEN 'python'
         ELSE REGEXP_REPLACE(i.image_name, '^.+/', '')
       END = '$image_filter')
GROUP BY s.scan_batch_id
ORDER BY MIN(s.scan_date);

WITH baseline_data AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE
      WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'vuln-demo/%' THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(i.image_name, '^vuln-demo/', '')
      WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'grafana/%' THEN 'grafana'
      WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'postgres/%' THEN 'postgres'
      WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'prom/%' THEN 'prometheus'
      WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'python/%' THEN 'python'
      ELSE REGEXP_REPLACE(i.image_name, '^.+/', '')
    END as name,
    i.image_name,
    i.size_bytes,
    COUNT(v.id) as total_vulnerabilities,
    SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'CRITICAL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as critical_count,
    SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'HIGH' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as high_count
  FROM scans s
  JOIN images i ON s.image_id = i.id
  LEFT JOIN vulnerabilities v ON v.scan_id = s.id
    AND (NULLIF('${package_category:raw}', 'All') IS NULL OR v.package_category = '${package_category}')
  WHERE s.id IN (
    SELECT MAX(id) FROM scans WHERE scan_status = 'completed' AND image_variant = 'baseline' GROUP BY image_id
  ) AND i.image_variant = 'baseline'
  GROUP BY i.image_name, i.size_bytes
),
chainguard_data AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE
      WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'vuln-demo/%' THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(i.image_name, '^vuln-demo/', '')
      WHEN i.image_name LIKE '%/grafana' THEN 'grafana'
      WHEN i.image_name LIKE '%/postgres' THEN 'postgres'
      WHEN i.image_name LIKE '%/prometheus' THEN 'prometheus'
      WHEN i.image_name LIKE '%/python-demo-custom' THEN 'python'
      ELSE REGEXP_REPLACE(i.image_name, '^.+/', '')
    END as name,
    i.image_name,
    i.size_bytes,
    COUNT(v.id) as total_vulnerabilities,
    SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'CRITICAL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as critical_count,
    SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'HIGH' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as high_count
  FROM scans s
  JOIN images i ON s.image_id = i.id
  LEFT JOIN vulnerabilities v ON v.scan_id = s.id
    AND (NULLIF('${package_category:raw}', 'All') IS NULL OR v.package_category = '${package_category}')
  WHERE s.id IN (
    SELECT MAX(id) FROM scans WHERE scan_status = 'completed' AND image_variant = 'chainguard' GROUP BY image_id
  ) AND i.image_variant = 'chainguard'
  GROUP BY i.image_name, i.size_bytes
)
SELECT 
  COALESCE(b.name, c.name) as "Service",
  ROUND((b.size_bytes / 1024.0 / 1024.0)::numeric, 1) as "Baseline Size (MB)",
  ROUND((c.size_bytes / 1024.0 / 1024.0)::numeric, 1) as "Chainguard Size (MB)",
  ROUND((((b.size_bytes - c.size_bytes)::numeric / NULLIF(b.size_bytes, 0)) * 100)::numeric, 1) as "Size Reduction %",
  b.total_vulnerabilities as "Baseline Vulns",
  c.total_vulnerabilities as "Chainguard Vulns",
  ROUND((((b.total_vulnerabilities - c.total_vulnerabilities)::numeric / NULLIF(b.total_vulnerabilities, 0)) * 100)::numeric, 1) as "Vuln Reduction %",
  b.critical_count as "Baseline Critical",
  c.critical_count as "Chainguard Critical",
  b.high_count as "Baseline High",
  c.high_count as "Chainguard High"
FROM baseline_data b
FULL OUTER JOIN chainguard_data c ON b.name = c.name
WHERE (NULLIF('$image_filter', 'All') IS NULL OR COALESCE(b.name, c.name) = '$image_filter')
ORDER BY "Vuln Reduction %" DESC NULLS LAST;

SELECT 'All' as name
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT 
  CASE
    WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'vuln-demo/%' THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(i.image_name, '^vuln-demo/', '')
    WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'grafana/%' OR i.image_name LIKE '%/grafana' THEN 'grafana'
    WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'postgres/%' OR i.image_name LIKE '%/postgres' THEN 'postgres'
    WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'prom/%' OR i.image_name LIKE '%/prometheus' THEN 'prometheus'
    WHEN i.image_name LIKE 'python/%' OR i.image_name LIKE '%/python-demo-custom' THEN 'python'
    ELSE REGEXP_REPLACE(i.image_name, '^.+/', '')
  END as name
FROM images i
ORDER BY name;
